publ: by 深圳市深呼吸照明有限公司
name: Curtain-Bot
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Now you can use Alexa to control all your Smart curtain devices! You can open/close your curtain simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices. 1) Download the App from App Store or Google Play Store, 2) Create a new account and log in, 3) Add a curtain device, 4) Talk to Alexa and control your curtain device.
